entries.help_name: This is the Macro page.  You can create and edit macros here.  This first entry is the name of the macro.  It must be one word.
entries.help_icon: Select an icon to associate with this macro.
entries.help_text: This is the actual macro definition.  Here is an example macro: Hi there; /stand; /pause 3; /bow %TT;  The first line is a text string that is spoken as spatial chat.  The second line calls the command Stand.  The third line makes the macro wait 3 seconds.  The final line makes your character bow to your current target.  See your documentation for more information about macros.
